data.sentence: The word خُذُوهُ comes from the root ا خ ذ and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to [make something] enter, clad with, put upon, burning with thirst, became unfaithful, collar, shackle, a thing in which one hides himself, dishonesty, insincerity, revenue from the land
data.sentence: The word فَغُلُّوهُ comes from the root غ ل ل and is associated with the meanings: to [make something] enter, clad with, put upon, burning with thirst, became unfaithful, collar, shackle, a thing in which one hides himself, dishonesty, insincerity, revenue from the land
